channel.copyright: © Ilyaas Mayet and Awande Buthelezi - all rights reserved

description.p: Join Ilyaas and Awande (and sometimes Zach too) as they pick apart culture, politics and the latest happenings in human society.
Sometimes they all agree, most of the time they don’t.

channel.itunes:subtitle: Let's talk about it
channel.itunes:author: QC : The Podcast | Solid Gold Studios

item.author: qc@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Ilyaas Mayet and Awande Buthelezi | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: Ilyaas Mayet and Awande Buthelezi | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Vague, Contradictory and Nonsensical (Part 2)
item.itunes:title: Vague, Contradictory and Nonsensical (Part 2)
item.itunes:subtitle: A look into the public protector’s road of (wins and) losses
item.description:
In Part 2, we’re rejoined by Tad Khosa and we deconstruct the public protector’s crusade against the president and try to figure out whether or not she’s good enough to keep her job. Awande also shows his love for Mmusi Maimane and we look into different conspiracies surrounding the government.


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.itunes:author: Ilyaas Mayet and Awande Buthelezi | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Only God Can Judge Me (Part 1)
item.itunes:title: Only God Can Judge Me (Part 1)
item.itunes:subtitle: A deep dive into the drama that is the office of the Public Protector
item.description:
In part 1, we’re joined by the indomitable Tad Khoza to discuss the public protector, who she is and what she does, her continued public losses in court and whether or not she’s good enough for the job.


Visit the Legal Resources Centre website click here

item.author: qc@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Ilyaas Mayet and Awande Buthelezi | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: Ilyaas Mayet and Awande Buthelezi | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Spidey Senses
item.itunes:title: Spidey Senses
item.itunes:subtitle: Where to from here for the MCU?
item.description:
*Spoiler Alert* This week, we discuss the new film, Spider-Man: Far From Home and how it fits into the continuation of the MCU. The QC team look into how the film will contribute to phase 4 of the MCU and speculate on Marvel’s plans to continue to keep its fans glued to screens for years to come.


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: qc@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Ilyaas Mayet and Awande Buthelezi | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: Ilyaas Mayet and Awande Buthelezi | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: The Sequel
item.itunes:title: The Sequel
item.itunes:subtitle: The State of our Nation
item.description:
In our maiden episode, we look at the State of the Nation Address given by the president of South Africa on 21 June 2019 and discuss and debate whether or not it hit the mark given South Africa's current political climate. Ilyaas and Awande dissect and debate the president's second SONA for the year and decide whether or not anything has been achieved by the government and ponder on whether or not the future is bright for the people of South Africa.


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
